Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim-section of a red-brown pottery bowl with flaring sides and grooved ledge-rim, both the interior and the exterior are covered with a dark-red slip, the exterior bears very faint traces of at least four lines of red-painted text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394834) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394834)
